column5: The Advanced Clinical Practice MSc is for nurses, midwives, paramedics, emergency care practitioners, pharmacists, community matrons and other allied healthcare workers who are advanced practitioners or will be expected to fulfil an advanced practice role.The course will enable you to develop skills in health assessment, diagnosis, clinical decision making, non-medical prescribing (if appropriate) and the application of evidence-based practice.By using a blended learning approach, we create a practice-focused, student-centred, flexible programme that develops your ability to:
column7: Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on the website
